Photon Mapping

A basic functional photon mapper as described by Jensen in his initial works.

Project 

Ray Tracer

Simple ray tracer. It supports phong lighting, Monte Carlo indirect lighting, reflections, refractions, textures, 3D models and more.

Project 

DynaBlaster

2D and 3D Amiga Dyna Blaster clone made with Java and OpenGL.

Application to automate card drops on the Steam platform.
